notes.description: These contributed settings can be read using vscode.workspace.getConfiguration('precisa')

languageServerExample.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

commands.title: PRECiSA: Generate stable PVS floating-point specification
PRECiSA: Generate stable C floating-point program

scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
